Uses of Interface
bayes.BayesGraph

  • Packages that use BayesGraph 
    Package Description
    bayes
    The package that offers an implementation of Dynamic Bayesian Networks.

    • Uses of BayesGraph in bayes

      Classes in bayes that implement BayesGraph 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BayesStaticGraph
      Represents a graph in a form of an adjacency list (extends AdjacencyList class) and also implements a BayesGraph Particularly it represents a static bayesian network which describes dependencies between random variables at a certain time interval
      class  BayesTransitionGraph
      Represents a graph in a form of an adjacency list (extends AdjacencyList class) and also implements a BayesGraph.
      Methods in bayes with parameters of type BayesGraph 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Tabu.add(BayesGraph graph)
      Adds a BayesianGraph object to the LinkedList
      boolean Tabu.contains(BayesGraph graph)
      Checks if the list contains a certain BayesianGraph object
      double ScoreMDL.getScore(BayesGraph grp)
      Calculates and returns the score of the network.
      double ScoreLL.getScore(BayesGraph grp)
      Calculates and returns the score of the network.
      abstract double Score.getScore(BayesGraph grp)
      Calculates and returns the score of the network.
